layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x36
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x36
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x20
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutInline {A} at (0,0) size 269x19 [color=#0000EE] [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 269x19
            text run at (0,0) width 269: "This anchor should have a green background"
        LayoutText {#text} at (269,0) size 141x19
          text run at (269,0) width 141: " (Don't follow this link.)"
